tool_description: Your Swiss army knife for NLP! Text summarization, sentiment check, text readability analysis, named entity extraction, segmentation, tokenization, SEO slug creation and much more.
name: Turbo NLP
title: Turbo NLP

api_list.name: Check Sentiment
api_list.description: This endpoint checks sentiment of the provided text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turbo-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/CheckSentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turbo-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://turbo-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/CheckSentiment"
